backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact inquiries, providing submission, retrieval, and timestamp-based sorting APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level website features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend components, sections, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point declaring SEO meta tags, favicon, Open Graph data, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing site sections, header/footer, WhatsApp button, and default SEO setup.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Validated contact form component that submits inquiries to the backend and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LazyGoogleMapEmb: Interactive map embed that loads a Google Maps iframe only after user action to improve performance.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with brand details, quick navigation links, contact info, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, mobile toggle, and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/components/StickyWhatsAppBu: Floating WhatsApp button for mobile that links to a prebuilt chat URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hook for fetching contact info from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactInqui: Hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor with submission state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/contactLinks.ts: Utility for generating phone and WhatsApp links with optional encoded messages.
frontend/src/lib/scroll.ts: Smooth-scroll helper that offsets scrolling to account for the fixed header.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Functions to update document title and meta tags for SEO and Open Graph content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/sections/AboutSection.tsx: About section layout presenting mission, vision, and teaching methodology with styled cards.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Renders the contact section with address, phone/WhatsApp links, office hours, a contact form, and a Google Map embed using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/sections/CoursesSection.tsx: Displays board and competitive foundation course cards with icons, color themes, and descriptions, along with headings and supporting text.
frontend/src/sections/HomeSection.tsx: Builds the hero area, CTA buttons, feature highlights, and course previews for the homepage using icons, gradients, and responsive layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, themes, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including requirements, features, architectural notes, image needs, and overall site goals.
